text: 8.43-44 Mat 9.20, Mak 5.28 Pen bin olap, bin kanɨb padɨkaknɨŋ yek, sap yeb anep umɨgan amnak. Bin anɨb ak nop gel suŋ lɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lak. Ne Jisas amek kud okok apɨl, chech palawl lak ak bad gol okok dɨnɨgaknɨŋ, nop suŋ lak.8.43-44 Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap kɨli apal, Takaw anɨb ak won olap mɨdeb apal. Takaw nɨm ak anɨgɨl agak, Bin anɨb ak, dokta okok yɨp gel suŋ laŋ agɨl kɨlop mani ne mɨdupsek ñolɨgup agak.
